page.title: 10TACKLEY ANGLING CLUB
page.content: Fishing is popular in the village. There are several rivers and the {Oxford Canal}nearby. It costs Â£1.25 to join and there are four fishing competitions a year. They are for the {Villagers' Cup, the Club Award and the {Bert Alder Trophy. The Christmas {Match}is sponsored and the money raised is used for prizes. Mr Woodward times the matches. We fish for{pike, chub and dace}at Hog Bottom on the{River Cherwell. } Last year I won the Bert Alder Cup and this year I won the Villagers' Cup. So far this year I have caught 2 chub, 3 perch and 1 dace. I keep a record of all the fish I catch every year. Five people in this school go fishing.
